mapper.select: select f.id as id, g.product_id as productId, g.agency_id as agencyId, g.goods_name as goodsName, g.thumbnail as thumbnail, g.goods_pic as goodsPic, g.price as price, g.goods_description as goodsDescription from goods g left join favorite f on g.id = f.favorite_id where f.type = '1' and f.open_id = #{openId}

select f.id, a.agency_name as agencyName, a.sys_user_name as sysUserName, a.sys_user_password as sysUserPassword, a.mobilephone as mobilephone, a.email as email, a.open_id as openId, a.is_cooperation as isCooperation, a.province, a.city, a.area, a.address, a.wechat_image_path as wechatImagePath, a.logo_image_path as logoImagePath, a.create_time as createTime, a.update_time as updateTime, a.latitude as latitude, a.longitude as longitude, a.status as status, a.type as type, a.is_del as isDel from agency_base a left join favorite f on a.id = f.favorite_id where f.type = '2' and f.open_id = #{openId}
